## FromIntervalOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FromIntervalOpts extends CommonOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [num](./rstream.fromintervalopts.num.md) | <code>number</code> | If given, only the stated number of values will be emitted (in the <code>[0...num)</code> interval) and the stream will become inactive (or close) after. |
